title: View health dashboards for a registered collector

blocks.content: You can use a collector's internal metrics to identify issues and make decisions about scaling based on resource usage. Visualize these metrics with out-of-the-box dashboards in Grafana Fleet Management.
The Fleet Management service displays dashboards based on Alloy Health metrics in the application interface.
In your Grafana Cloud stack, click **Connections** > **Collector** > **Fleet Management**.
Search, filter, or sort to find the unhealthy collector in your **Inventory**.
Click on the collector to open the details view drawer and view the **Health** tab.
In the next milestone, you'll see the logs associated with a collector.
